title: Developing Simple Pay-to-Script Applications with ErgoScript
summary: This document provides a guide on developing simple pay-to-script (P2S) applications using ErgoScript. It introduces the P2S address compiler available at wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s and provides examples of applications that can be created, such as Wrapped ERG, Crowdfunding, and 3-out-of-5 Threshold Signature. The document explains the key features and functionality of these example applications, allowing users to understand the capabilities of P2S applications built with ErgoScript.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the pay-to-script (P2S) address compiler on wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s?
qa_pairs.answer: The pay-to-script (P2S) address compiler on wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s allows you to create basic applications using ErgoScript.

qa_pairs.question: What is an example of a crowdfunding application that can be created with ErgoScript?
qa_pairs.answer: The crowdfunding script provides a method to raise funds within a specified timeframe, where the funds can only be accessed if the fundraising goal is met by the deadline, otherwise the funds can be returned to the backers.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the Wrapped ERG script?
qa_pairs.answer: The Wrapped ERG script lets you exchange Wrapped ERG tokens for native ERG on a trustless 1:1 basis.

qa_pairs.question: What is an example of a multisig application that can be created with ErgoScript?
qa_pairs.answer: The 3-out-of-5 Threshold Signature script allows for a 3-out-of-5 threshold signature, where multiple parties must sign to access the funds.

qa_pairs.question: Where can users find more information on the Wrapped ERG script?
qa_pairs.answer: Users can find more information on the Wrapped ERG script in the Wrapped ERG forum thread on the Ergo Forum.

sections.heading: Developing Simple Pay-to-Script Applications with ErgoScript
sections.content: With ErgoScript, you can create basic applications using the pay-to-script (P2S) address compiler available at [wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s](https://wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s/). Check out [this video tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6Mf-oxaLIc) for more details. When you transmit a transaction to this P2S address, the output is locked with the script you input.

sections.heading: Example Applications
sections.content:
Here are a few examples of what you can create:

- **Wrapped ERG**: This script lets you exchange Wrapped ERG tokens for native ERG on a trustless 1:1 basis. For more information, check out the [Wrapped ERG forum thread](https://www.ergoforum.org/t/wrapped-erg-wrapping-native-erg-as-a-1-1-token/469).

- **Crowdfunding**: This script provides a method to raise funds within a specified timeframe. The funds can only be accessed if the fundraising goal is met by the deadline. If the deadline passes without reaching the goal, the funds can be returned to the backers. See the script on [Pluto Monkey P2S](https://wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s/?

KQogICBmdW5kcmFpc2luZ0ZhaWx1cmUgfHwgZnVuZHJhaXNpbmdTdWNjZXNzCiB9).

- **3-out-of-5 Threshold Signature**: This script allows the creation of a multi-signature wallet that requires the agreement of at least three out of five participants to authorize transactions. The script can be found on [Pluto Monkey P2S](https://wallet.plutomonkey.com/p2s/?).
